mapper.insert: insert into zlogistics.member_leave_info( leave_info_date, leave_info_time, distribution_member_id, create_time, create_id, last_update_time, last_update_id )values( #{leaveInfoDate}, #{leaveInfoTime}, #{distributionMemberId}, now(), 0, now(), 0 )
mapper.select: select leave_info_id as leaveInfoId, leave_info_date as leaveInfoDate, leave_info_mask as leaveInfoMask, distribution_member_id as distributionMemberId, create_time as createTime, create_id as createId, last_update_time as lastUpdateTime, last_update_id as lastUpdateId from zlogistics.member_leave_info where is_deleted = 0 and leave_info_id = #{leaveInfoId}
